content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created. The AI was asked to browse the National Geographic website for the latest news on the environment, but found no specific news. The AI then requested to list the files in the current directory to see what resources were available. The command "list_files" was used and returned a list of files in the current directory.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.nationalgeographic.com/environment/", "question": "latest news on the environment"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a collection of articles and videos related to the environment, covering topics such as air quality, climate change, marine reserves, foraging, and dust storms. It also includes a section on history and culture, as well as travel recommendations. One article highlights Japan's plan to release nuclear wastewater into the Pacific.\n\nLinks: [' (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/)', ' (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/search)', 'Newsletters (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/newsletters/signup)', 'Subscribe (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/subscribe)', 'Orange skies are the future. Prepare yourself. (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/environment/article/wildfire-smoke-exposure-protection-tips)']", type='action_result')]
"""
